section.title: Purpose
section.para: This area of documentation will contain several guides that explain both the existing functionality of the edit coordinate features in classic Komet, but also outline the ongoing work to bring these features and functionalities into Next Gen Komet.

emphasis.emphasis: NOTE: This document is a work in progressâ€¦ as research comes out of the spike efforts, more information will be added to this document.

section.title: Goals
section.para: Once finalized, this document should clearly compare the classic and NextGen approaches for each feature, highlight any gaps or challenges, and provide actionable recommendations for implementation in NextGen Komet.
